org.apache.flink.streaming.partitioner

Interface StreamPartitioner<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the Tuple
    All Superinterfaces:
    ChannelSelector<SerializationDelegate<StreamRecord<T>>>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BroadcastPartitioner, DistributePartitioner, FieldsPartitioner, ForwardPartitioner, GlobalPartitioner, ShufflePartitioner

    public interface StreamPartitioner<T>
extends ChannelSelector<SerializationDelegate<StreamRecord<T>>>, Serializable
    Empty interface to encapsulate partitioners.
